sn28.3:1: At Sāvatthī … . The Venerable Ānanda saw the Venerable Sāriputta coming in the distance … .
sn28.3:2: "Here, friend, with the fading away as well of rapture, I dwelt equanimous and, mindful and clearly comprehending, I experienced happiness with the body; I entered and dwelt in the third jhāna of which the noble ones declare: ‘He is equanimous, mindful, one who dwells happily.’sn.iii.37Yet, friend, it did not occur to me, ‘I am attaining the third jhāna … .’"Complete as in preceding sutta.
